ticket.title: Complete the cleanup with BacktraceCleaner
ticket.original-body:
There are still a few loose ends with http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/f42c77f927eb49b00e84d355e07de48723d03fcb. Most importantly, we should deprecate the Exception extensions in Active Support and update the template error templates to use a version of BacktraceCleaner to split trace into app/framework/all.
Also, we need a way to mix in Rails::BacktraceFilter into minitest/unit to get backtrace filtering for tests running off that too (currently it's only for test/unit).

Most importantly, we should deprecate the Exception extensions in Active Support and update the template error templates to use a version of BacktraceCleaner to split trace into app/framework/all.
Also, we need a way to mix in Rails::BacktraceFilter into minitest/unit to get backtrace filtering for tests running off that too (currently it's only for test/unit).

Also, we need a way to mix in Rails::BacktraceFilter into minitest/unit to get backtrace filtering for tests running off that too (currently it's only for test/unit).

version.title: Complete the cleanup with BacktraceCleaner

version.body: It's good enough for now. Not critical for 2.3.
version.body-html: It's good enough for now. Not critical for 2.3.
version.title: Complete the cleanup with BacktraceCleaner

version.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.
The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.
Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
version.body-html:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not been commented on for at least three months.

The resources of the Rails core team are limited, and so we are asking for your help. If you can still reproduce this error on the 3-0-stable branch or on master, please reply with all of the information you have about it and add "[state:open]" to your comment. This will reopen the ticket for review. Likewise, if you feel that this is a very important feature for Rails to include, please reply with your explanation so we can consider it.

Thank you for all your contributions, and we hope you will understand this step to focus our efforts where they are most helpful.
version.title: Complete the cleanup with BacktraceCleaner
